Author: entirecircuslol
Text: Maybe it's your metabolism slowing down? After a while of not eating enough, you body's natural response is to slow down the metabolism to preserve the limited energy you get from the small amount you eat, so due to this, it is possible that your metabolism is sowed down and you are not losing weight anymore. I would recommend a cheat day maybe or a way to 'kick' your metabolism with energy rush.
